Constructor Detail

JerooWorld

public JerooWorld()
Creates an island that is all grass.

JerooWorld

public JerooWorld(String file)
Creates an island from a jev file. The file format that it expects is identical to the island format in Jeroo.

Parameters:
file - the file to load
Method Detail

load

public void load(String file)
Loads a Jeroo Environment from a jev file. The file format that it expects is identical to the island format in Jeroo.

Parameters:
file - the file to load
